Embed Font

To embed your selected fonts into a webpage, copy this code into the <head> of your HTML document.

STANDARD @IMPORT
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto" rel="stylesheet">
  • Default
  • Advanced 
<script src="https://use.typekit.net/ero6oyp.js"></script>
<script>try{Typekit.load({ async: true });}catch(e){}</script>

The default embed code is simple and easy to use. It does a good job of hiding the flash of unstyled text by blocking rendering while loading. Learn more.

Resource Code: Copy & paste in the <head> tag of each page you want to use the Resource.

<link href="//cloud.webtype.com/css/47743fd5-0482-4c57-9220-ed5734160876.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

Copy the code below and paste it into your website's HTML between the <head> and </head> tags. The code only needs to be pasted once. Subsequent changes to your style sheet will automatically be reflected on your webpage without modifying the code.

<script type="text/javascript" src="//fast.fonts.net/jsapi/8f77360e-33b9-4143-8842-2dcfc7f8480f.js"></script>

<xf:if is="{{ $em_gfonts }}">
 	<link rel="preload" href="{{ $em_gfonts }}" as="style" crossorigin="anonymous">
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $em_gfonts }}">
</xf:if>

<xf:foreach loop="$em_typekit" value="$font">
	<link rel="preload" href="https://use.typekit.net/{{$font}}.js" as="script" crossorigin="anonymous">
	<script>
	  (function(d) {
		var config = {
		  kitId: '{{ $font }}',
		  scriptTimeout: 3000,
		  async: true
		},
		h=d.documentElement,t=setTimeout(function(){h.className=h.className.replace(/\bwf-loading\b/g,"")+" wf-inactive";},config.scriptTimeout),tk=d.createElement("script"),f=false,s=d.getElementsByTagName("script")[0],a;h.className+=" wf-loading";tk.src='https://use.typekit.net/'+config.kitId+'.js';tk.async=true;tk.onload=tk.onreadystatechange=function(){a=this.readyState;if(f||a&&a!="complete"&&a!="loaded")return;f=true;clearTimeout(t);try{Typekit.load(config)}catch(e){}};s.parentNode.insertBefore(tk,s)
	  })(document);
	</script>
</xf:foreach>

<xf:foreach loop="$em_webtype" value="$font">
 	<link rel="preload" href="https://cloud.webtype.com/css/{{ $font }}.css" as="style" crossorigin="anonymous">
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cloud.webtype.com/css/{{ $font }}.css">
</xf:foreach>

<xf:foreach loop="$em_fonts" value="$font">
 	<link rel="preload" href="https://fast.fonts.net/jsapi/{{ $font }}.js" as="script" crossorigin="anonymous">
	<script src="https://fast.fonts.net/jsapi/{{ $font }}.js"></script>
</xf:foreach>

<xf:if is="$em_serverFonts">
	<style>
		<xf:foreach loop="$em_serverFonts" value="$font">
			@font-face {
				font-family: '{$font.filename|raw}';
				src: {$font.src|raw};
				font-weight: normal;
				font-style: normal;
			}
		</xf:foreach>
	</style>
</xf:if>

<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.image }}"> <xf:css src="kl_em_froala_image.less" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.table }}"> <xf:js src="vendor/froala/plugins/table.min.js" /> <xf:css src="kl_em_froala_table.less" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.fullscreen }}"> <xf:js src="vendor/froala/plugins/fullscreen.min.js" /> <xf:css src="kl_em_froala_fullscreen.less" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.hide }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/hide.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.templates }}"> <xf:css src="kl_em_editor_templates.less" /> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/templates.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> <script class="js-klEditorTemplates" type="application/json"> {$templates|json|raw} </script> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.charCounter }}"> <xf:js src="vendor/froala/plugins/char_counter.min.js" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.specialCharacters }}"> <xf:js src="vendor/froala/plugins/special_characters.min.js" /> <xf:css src="kl_em_froala_special_characters.less" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.ispoiler }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/inlineSpoiler.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.justify }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/justify.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.dropdowns }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/dropdowns.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.parseHtml }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/parseHtml.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.colors }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/colors.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.gFontFamily }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/gFontFamily.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $plugins.unlinkAll }}"> <xf:js src="editor-manager/plugins/unlinkAll.plugin.js" min="1" addon="KL/EditorManager" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="{{ $config.initOnClick }}"> <xf:js> $('.actionBar-action--reply, .button--multiQuote').on('click', function(event) { $('.fr-view').trigger('focus'); }); </xf:js> </xf:if>
